data.title: Danish Prime Minister to Work More From Office After Attack
data.meta_description: Denmark’s Prime Minister Mette Frederiksen said she will carry out more of her duties from the office than usual after being attacked on the street in Copenhagen.
data.text:
Frederiksen says she may have to act differently for a while

Danish leader canceled several election events after attack

Denmark’s Prime Minister Mette Frederiksen said she will carry out more of her duties from the office than usual after being attacked on the street in Copenhagen.

Frederiksen, giving her first TV interview since the assault on Friday, told national broadcaster DR she may also have to act differently in larger gatherings and events for a while.
